thread.title: Very buff ref becomes early star of college football national championship
thread.title_full: Very buff ref becomes early star of college football national championship

author: Sam Laird
title: Very buff ref becomes early star of college football national championship
text:
The early star of Monday night's college football national championship game between Alabama and Clemson played for neither the Crimson Tide nor the Tigers.
No, the early star was a ref â€” an unusually buff ref, that is.
SEE ALSO: The most dad-ass dad sneaker of all time just became even more dad
The ref in question's name is Mike Defee, a 54-year-old who typically calls games in the Big 12 Conference. Defee is indeed particularly jacked â€” and his yolked-ness was amply displayed each time ESPN cameras zeroed in on him while he explained a call on the field.
The peanut gallery on Twitter , of course, had a field day with a ref who looked like he could still blow up a running play in the backfield.
when every day is arm day pic.twitter.com/V9i7kACi1l
â€” ESPN CollegeFootball (@ESPNCFB) January 10, 2017
Jacked ref alert. #NationalChampionship #oldmanstrength pic.twitter.com/0lXisE9wnd
â€” Darrell Romuld (CTV) (@CTVDarrell) January 10, 2017
Me: "everyone is tweeting about that buff ref"
Mom: "...he's hot" #NationalChampionship
â€” Leslie Ann (@leslie_hudgeons) January 10, 2017
Anybody gives the Ref any lip tonight during the game, he might go Ultimate Warrior on them. Dude is jacked!
â€” War Eagle! (@wardmneagle) January 10, 2017
Bruh. This ref is freaking buff af ðŸ˜‚
â€” Niol Gonzalez (@Niol_Gonzalez) January 10, 2017
When you hit triceps earlier today and you want America to be aware. pic.twitter.com/AwWDyFaVpa
â€” CBS Sports (@CBSSports) January 10, 2017
Don't f*** with beefy ref pic.twitter.com/3Aw8FutovW
â€” CJ Fogler (@cjzero) January 10, 2017
Whys the head ref the most jacked guy on the field?
â€” Jim Still (@JimStill1) January 10, 2017
Many were also quick to note the similarities between Defee and Ed Hochuli , an NFL official similarly renowned for his apparent dedication to a rigorous workout regimen. Hochuli's name even briefly became a trending topic, thanks to football fans' obsession with Defee.
Yo Ed Hochuli, do you even lift bro? pic.twitter.com/MAAKCyrAjf
â€” SB Nation GIF (@SBNationGIF) January 10, 2017
Mike Defee Vs. Ed Hochuli
Who you got? pic.twitter.com/LT5UTxzVbd
â€” Barstool Auburn (@BarstoolAuburn) January 10, 2017
Instead of the Pro Bowl, let's just have a boxing match between Ed Hochuli and this swoll ref.
â€” Robert Mays (@robertmays) January 10, 2017
Too much to ask for tonightâ€™s referee and Ed Hochuli to step into the squared circle at some point? For charity? Letâ€™s get â€˜er done.
â€” Kevin Seifert (@SeifertESPN) January 10, 2017
Anyway, congrats to Defee on being buff and congrats to Twitter on the faves and retweets.
BONUS: This robot can probably fold clothes better than you
